summary: The diff only updates `project_state.json` metadata and does not implement the requested backend change to allowlist the specified Principal as an admin. No backend Motoko code or upgrade/stable-state logic is present in the changes.

missing_requirements.requirement: Update the backend admin allowlist so that Principal `vtyfq-kcl6h-mvrxs-ixdx3-ew454-lywvd-3om5o-z3adc-gankr-lwzz2-jae` is recognized as an admin by the canister (i.e., `AccessControl.isAdmin(accessControlState, caller)` returns true for that Principal) and can access all existing admin-only methods; ensure the change persists after redeploy/upgrade.
missing_requirements.reason: No changes were made to the backend Motoko actor (`backend/main.mo`) or any access control/stable state/upgrade logic. The only modified file is `project_state.json`, which is not part of the running canister logic.

hallucinated_features.description: Added new feature request tracking entries (AR-1, AR-2) marked as pending in project metadata.
hallucinated_features.reason: The BuildRequest asks for a backend allowlist implementation change, not for adding/updating project tracking metadata or new request IDs in `project_state.json`.

hallucinated_features.description: Introduced/flagged a production URL loading issue in known issues and set `isFixRequest: true`.
hallucinated_features.reason: The BuildRequest explicitly states the production URL loading issue is out of scope unless directly required; the diff adds this issue to metadata and marks the item as a fix request without implementing the admin allowlist change.
